verses.verse: וַיְדַבֵּ֥ר <WH1696> vay-dab-Ber spake יְהוָ֖ה <WH3068> Yah-weh And the LORD אֶל־ <WH413> 'el- to מֹשֶׁ֥ה <WH4872> mo-Sheh unto Moses לֵּאמֹֽר׃ <WH559> le-Mor. saying

דַּבֵּר֙ <WH1696> dab-Ber Speak אֶל־ <WH413> 'el- to בְּנֵ֣י <WH1121> be-Nei unto the children יִשְׂרָאֵ֔ל <WH3478> Yis-ra-'El, of Israel וְאָמַרְתָּ֖ <WH559> ve-'a-mar-Ta and say אֲלֵהֶ֑ם <WH413> 'a-le-Hem; to כִּ֣י <WH3588> ki When תָבֹ֗אוּ <WH935> ta-Vo-'u, unto them When ye be come אֶל־ <WH413> 'el- about אֶ֙רֶץ֙ <WH776> 'e-retz into the land מוֹשְׁבֹ֣תֵיכֶ֔ם <WH4186> mo-she-Vo-tei-Chem, of your habitations אֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> 'a-Sher which אֲנִ֖י <WH589> 'a-Ni I am נֹתֵ֥ן <WH5414> no-Ten which I give לָכֶֽם׃ la-Chem.

וְהִקְרִ֛יב <WH7126> ve-hik-Riv Then shall he that offereth הַמַּקְרִ֥יב <WH7126> ham-mak-Riv bring קָרְבָּנ֖וֹ <WH7133> ka-re-ba-No his offering לַֽיהוָ֑ה <WH3068> Yah-weh; unto the LORD מִנְחָה֙ <WH4503> min-Chah a meat offering סֹ֣לֶת <WH5560> So-let of flour עִשָּׂר֔וֹן <WH6241> is-sa-Ron, of a tenth deal בָּל֕וּל <WH1101> ba-Lul mingled בִּרְבִעִ֥ית <WH7243> bir-vi-'It with the fourth הַהִ֖ין <WH1969> ha-Hin [part] of an hin שָֽׁמֶן׃ <WH8081> Sha-men. of oil

וְיַ֤יִן <WH3196> ve-Ya-yin of wine לַנֶּ֙סֶךְ֙ <WH5262> lan-Ne-sech for a drink offering רְבִיעִ֣ית <WH7243> re-vi-'It And the fourth הַהִ֔ין <WH1969> ha-Hin, [part] of an hin תַּעֲשֶׂ֥ה <WH6213> ta-'a-Seh shalt thou prepare עַל־ <WH5921> 'al- with הָעֹלָ֖ה <WH5930> ha-'o-Lah with the burnt offering א֣וֹ <WH176> o or לַזָּ֑בַח <WH2077> laz-Za-vach; or sacrifice לַכֶּ֖בֶשׂ <WH3532> lak-Ke-ves lamb הָאֶחָֽד׃ <WH259> ha-'e-Chad. for one

כָּ֣כָה <WH3602> Ka-chah Thus יֵעָשֶׂ֗ה <WH6213> ye-'a-Seh, Thus shall it be done לַשּׁוֹר֙ <WH7794> lash-shOr bullock הָֽאֶחָ֔ד <WH259> ha-'e-Chad, for one א֖וֹ <WH176> o or לָאַ֣יִל <WH352> la-'A-yil ram הָאֶחָ֑ד <WH259> ha-'e-Chad; or for one אֽוֹ־ <WH176> 'ov- or לַשֶּׂ֥ה <WH7716> las-Seh lambs בַכְּבָשִׂ֖ים <WH3532> vak-ke-va-Sim of the male א֥וֹ <WH176> o or בָעִזִּֽים׃ <WH5795> va-'iz-Zim. or a kid

כַּמִּסְפָּ֖ר <WH4557> kam-mis-Par According to the number אֲשֶׁ֣ר <WH834> 'a-Sher you תַּעֲשׂ֑וּ <WH6213> ta-'a-Su; that ye shall prepare כָּ֛כָה <WH3602> Ka-chah so תַּעֲשׂ֥וּ <WH6213> ta-'a-Su shall ye do לָאֶחָ֖ד <WH259> la-'e-Chad to every one כְּמִסְפָּרָֽם׃ <WH4557> ke-mis-pa-Ram. according to their number

כָּל־ <WH3605> kol- All הָאֶזְרָ֥ח <WH249> ha-'ez-Rach All that are born of the country יַעֲשֶׂה־ <WH6213> ya-'a-seh- shall do כָּ֖כָה <WH3602> Ka-chah this אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- אֵ֑לֶּה <WH428> 'El-leh; these לְהַקְרִ֛יב <WH7126> le-hak-Riv these things after this manner in offering אִשֵּׁ֥ה <WH801> 'ish-Sheh an offering made by fire רֵֽיחַ־ <WH7381> rei-ach- savour נִיחֹ֖חַ <WH5207> ni-Cho-ach of a sweet לַֽיהוָֽה׃ <WH3068> Yah-weh. unto the LORD

וְכִֽי־ <WH3588> ve-chi- If יָגוּר֩ <WH1481> ya-Gur sojourn אִתְּכֶ֨ם <WH854> 'it-te-Chem for גֵּ֜ר <WH1616> ger And if a stranger א֤וֹ <WH176> o or אֲשֶֽׁר־ <WH834> 'a-Sher- who בְּתֽוֹכְכֶם֙ <WH8432> be-toch-Chem with you or whosoever [be] among לְדֹרֹ֣תֵיכֶ֔ם <WH1755> le-do-Ro-tei-Chem, you in your generations וְעָשָׂ֛ה <WH6213> ve-'a-Sah and will offer אִשֵּׁ֥ה <WH801> 'ish-Sheh an offering made by fire רֵֽיחַ־ <WH7381> rei-ach- savour נִיחֹ֖חַ <WH5207> ni-Cho-ach of a sweet לַיהוָ֑ה <WH3068> Yah-weh; unto the LORD כַּאֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> ka-'a-Sher who תַּעֲשׂ֖וּ <WH6213> ta-'a-Su as ye do כֵּ֥ן <WH3651> ken so יַעֲשֶֽׂה׃ <WH6213> ya-'a-Seh. so he shall do

הַקָּהָ֕ל <WH6951> hak-ka-Hal [shall be both] for you of the congregation חֻקָּ֥ה <WH2708> chuk-Kah ordinance אַחַ֛ת <WH259> 'a-Chat One לָכֶ֖ם la-Chem וְלַגֵּ֣ר <WH1616> ve-lag-Ger and also for the stranger הַגָּ֑ר <WH1481> hag-Gar; that sojourneth חֻקַּ֤ת <WH2708> chuk-Kat [with you] an ordinance עוֹלָם֙ <WH5769> o-Lam for ever לְדֹרֹ֣תֵיכֶ֔ם <WH1755> le-do-Ro-tei-Chem, in your generations כָּכֶ֛ם ka-Chem כַּגֵּ֥ר <WH1616> kag-Ger as ye [are] so shall the stranger יִהְיֶ֖ה <WH1961> yih-Yeh become לִפְנֵ֥י <WH6440> lif-Nei be before יְהוָֽה׃ <WH3068> Yah-weh. the LORD

תּוֹרָ֥ה <WH8451> to-Rah law אַחַ֛ת <WH259> 'a-Chat One וּמִשְׁפָּ֥ט <WH4941> u-mish-Pat manner אֶחָ֖ד <WH259> 'e-Chad and one יִהְיֶ֣ה <WH1961> yih-Yeh become לָכֶ֑ם la-Chem; וְלַגֵּ֖ר <WH1616> ve-lag-Ger shall be for you and for the stranger הַגָּ֥ר <WH1481> hag-Gar that sojourneth אִתְּכֶֽם׃ <WH854> 'it-te-Chem. for פ Peh
